name: WaterTracker
0:
”Alexa Open Water Tracker”
”Alexa tell water tracker to add 1 pint of water”
”Alexa, Launch Water Tracker”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: water tracker
Developer Terms of Use
des: This water tracker uses fitbit integration to track your water usage. You can simply say add and then the amount of water you want to add to fitbit. It has a daily goal of 2 litres. All data will be synced with fitbit.
